data.name: RPG Maker MZ - RPG Character Pack 4
data.detailed_description:
Welcome to RPG Character Pack 4 from Gee Kun Soft containing 16 exciting new characters to choose from when picking your latest heroes or foes for your next RPG. This character pack includes a Bounty Hunter, Dark Elf, Dwarf, Fighter, Goblin, Hitman Girl, Knight Girl, Lancer, Lizard Man, Majic Fencer, Mechanic, Naginata Master, Ogre, Orc, Vampire, and Vampire Girl.

Each of the characters have the traditional sprites with side views and three different “down” states when defeated in battle. There are also 13 fully illustrated full body images with different expressions for each character, 8 bust images per character, and a bonus image per character that presents them all in great detail while telling your story.

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
